name: Cuper's Caper Beta 1
description:
For many years the haybales have been oppressed

They were used for target practice by the monkey overlords

now after hundreds of years...

one rebels.....

Cuper's Caper is a fun 3d Platformer made using the Blender Game Engine.  This beta is the first of many more to come. Beta 1 includes the first seven levels and the intro. The object of the game is to platform through the levels and complete them all. Please keep in mind that this is a very early version of the final game. With that said, I hope you enjoy.

If you would like to be notified when the next update is available please send us an email at cx_vortex@yahoo.com.
